name: Son Of A Sun (playable prototype)
description:
Controls  
Left and right arrow keys to move the sun
Space to instruct the son (blue body) to take 2 steps

Son of a Sun is a single-player puzzle game that combines a turn-based mechanic and elements of continuous game-play in a single experience. The player assumes the role of the Sun and moves around to manipulate the shadows. The objective is to help the sun's son sneak away without being seen, the only problem is - he's too (photo)sensitive

Team Members: 
Amar,  Arjun , Rahul,  Shreeya, Vaibhav 
DGD 2018, NID Bengaluru

*SPOILER HINT AHEAD*

The sun moves BOTH ways, players often tend to forget that
